app.name: BeebemWii
app.long_description:
This is a port of Beebem gp2x(0.6-1), a BBC micro emulator. Here are the menu controls and special buttons used in-game.
Wiimote:
A : Confirm B : Back + : Open virtual keyboard Home : Open main menu
Classic controller:
A : Confirm B : Back + : Open virtual keyboard Home : Open main menu
GameCube controller:
A : Confirm B : Back R : Open virtual keyboard Start : Open main menu
Some Wii buttons are mapped to BBC Micro's keys by default. You can configure the buttons for each game. See the Readme/manual for more information.
